00013         function unhtmlentities($string)
00014         {
00015                 // replace numeric entities
00016                 $string = preg_replace('/&[lr]squo;/', '\'', $string);
00017                 $string = preg_replace('/&[lr]dquo;/', '"', $string);
00018                 return html_entity_decode($string, ENT_QUOTES);
00019         }
00020         
00021         foreach ($this->posts as $post)
00022         {
00023 ?>

00027                         <link><?php echo $post->permalink(FALSE); ?></link>
